abstract.text: Asynchronously loads a cube map texture image from a series of files and creates a new texture from the data.

inlineContent.text: An array of paths to the six files that make up the cube map.
A dictionary that describes any additional steps you want the texture loader to take when loading the texture. See
A dispatch queue that your block is called on when the task completes. If
is passed, the block is called on the main dispatch queue.
A block to be called when the task completes.

, except that it loads the texture asynchronously. When this method is called, it creates a new background task to handle the request and then returns control to your app. Later, when the task is complete, GLKit calls your completion handler on the queue you provided.

abstract.text: Speed up OpenGL ES or OpenGL app development. Use math libraries, background texture loading, pre-created shader effects, and a standard view and view controller to implement your rendering loop.
Information about OpenGL textures created by the
A utility class that simplifies loading OpenGL or OpenGL ES texture datas from a variety of image file formats.
Loads a cube map texture image from a single URL and creates a new texture from the data.
Loads a cube map texture image from a single file and creates a new texture from the data.
Asynchronously loads a cube map texture image from a single file and creates a new texture from the data.
Loads a cube map texture image from a series of files and creates a new texture from the data.
Asynchronously loads a cube map texture image from a series of files and creates a new texture from the data.
Signature for the block executed after an asynchronous texture loading operation completes.
A lightweight object to which your application submits blocks for subsequent execution.
An object wrapper for primitive scalar numeric values.
A Unicode string value that is a collection of characters.
